channel.description: Recent content in kotlin on Fresh Swift

item.title: Swift vs. Kotlin — the differences in memory management
item.description: In this post Krzysztof Turek compares Swift with Kotlin in the context of iOS and Android development, explaining how each language and platform handles memory management.

item.title: Data Classes in Swift
item.description: This is an interesting post from Jorge Martín in which he looks at Kotlin’s data class type, and examines how such a type could be used in Swift to easily copy and mutate state.

item.title: SwiftKotlin: A tool to convert Swift code to Kotlin.
item.description: This is a cool tool to convert Swift to Kotlin. It can be used as a framework, command line tool, and a Mac app. Whenever I see Swift code translated to Kotlin, I am reminded of how similar the two languages are.
